24.movie_plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

148.movie_plot: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

113.movie_plot: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

131.movie_plot: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.

52.movie_plot: A young thief, seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who also pursues vengeance of his own.

98.movie_plot: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saves him from drowning as a boy and falls in love not knowing who/what she is.

25.movie_plot: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

156.movie_plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives rise to a super-intelligent chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

19.movie_plot: When a street urchin vies for the love of a beautiful princess, he uses a genie's magic power to make himself off as a prince in order to marry her.

93.movie_plot: In rural 1800s England things go bad for a young matchmaker after she finds a man for another woman.

51.movie_plot: After being arrested during a manic episode, a man who suffers from bipolar disorder is treated by a psychiatrist who begins to develop romantic feelings towards him.

3.movie_plot: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

127.movie_plot: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

95.movie_plot: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

21.movie_plot: The story of James Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to become a champion and an inspiration in the 1930s.

134.movie_plot: A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

108.movie_plot: Modernization of Charles Dickens classic story finds the hapless Finn as a painter in New York City pursuing his unrequited and haughty childhood love.

124.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

146.movie_plot: Two business rivals who despise each other in real life unwittingly fall in love over the Internet.

54.movie_plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

101.movie_plot: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former secretary.

159.movie_plot: An idiotic man struggles to make it through life on his own in St. Louis.

32.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
32.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

89.movie_plot: A mentally challenged young woman seeks independence by obtaining her own apartment and attending college while her family plans her sister's wedding.

71.movie_plot: A local sheriff, a marine biologist and an old seafarer team up to hunt down a great white shark wrecking havoc in a beach resort.

116.movie_plot: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

166.movie_plot: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.
